title: Push-ready handoff
summary: Push readiness helper + assignment locator on main; next agents can run push_ready and assignment_locator before new work.
actions: Documented readiness workflow on manager lane, committed helper receipts to repo, and pushed to main.
notes: Before new pushes, run python3 -m tools.agent.push_ready --require-test <receipt> and python3 -m tools.agent.assignment_locator to catch stale claims/plan gaps.
